articles.title: South Africa vs England: First ODI postponed after Proteas player tests positive for coronavirus - Sky Sports
articles.content: The first match of England's ODI series in South Africa has been postponed after a Proteas player tested positive for coronavirus.

articles.title: COVID-19: Primark reveals £430m lockdown sales hit as it refuses to go online - Sky News
articles.content: In a week that has seen three big fashion names collapse, the budget clothing chain continues to expand  despite virus disruption.
